length ball outside off, comes forward and defends towards point with an angled bat
short of length outside off, left alone this time
length ball angling in towards the off stump, Zadran stays back and defends it late
fuller outside off and Ahmadi leans into the drive, dispatches it through extra cover
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
length ball around off, stays back and defends on the off side
fuller again, this time on middle and leg and Ahmadi flicks it to the deep square leg boundary
length ball around off, comes forward and offers a solid defence
length ball outside off, left alone
fuller around off, pushed back towards the bowler from the front foot
too full and a gorgeous front-foot drive, the cover fielder fumbles to allow a single
pitched up once again, driven towards cover. Another fumble but no run this time
length ball outside off, defended from the front foot
short of length outside off, taps it towards point
length ball around off, stays back and defends again
fuller around off, lunges forward and blocks
fuller around off, defended under his eyes
fuller around off, gets low and blocks again
length ball outside off, gets a thick outside edge past second slip
some turn this time, a length ball around off, beats the bat as Zadran looks to defend
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover, a tumbling stop there
short of length around off, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length outside off, pushes the batsman back who looks to work it on the off side, gets beaten
tossed up around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, goes aerial but doesn't get hold of it. Falls short of the charging in long-on
length ball outside off, goes straight with the arm to beat the bat
length outside off, spins back in sharply with Ahmadi on the back foot, gets an inside edge on to the pads
length ball around off, goes back and defends
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
pitched up at the stumps, lunges forward and blocks again
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off
length ball around off, Ahmadi comes forward to defend and gets beaten as the ball spins away
too full around off, Ahamdi jams his bat at it
length ball around off, goes back and defends
a touch fuller on middle and leg, comes forward and dead-bats it
fuller around off, driven towards long-on from the front foot
length ball around off and middle, defended from the back foot
length ball around off, turns it towards backward square leg after leaning low

and Cornwall doesn't take long to strike! But wait, they are checking for the no-ball and there is nothing behind the line. Was a length ball, Ahmadi comes forward to defend, bat-pad and it lobs towards Holder at leg slip but it all amounts to nothing
fuller on the stumps, right on the top of the ball to defend this one
length ball outside off, left alone as it spins away sharply
fuller around off, lunges forward and defends
fuller outside off, was in the air for while but well away from the extra cover fielder, gets a boundary
fuller around off, lunges forward, gets an inside edge towards fine leg
length ball outside off, defends it towards the off side
length around off, spins back in to the batsman, chopped towards square leg
length ball around off and middle, negotiated on the leg side
length ball on middle and leg, turned away towards leg slip
length ball around off, lunges forward and blocks
a touch fuller this time, defended from the front foot once again
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
pitched up on middle and leg, drives it back towards the bowler
length ball around off, goes back and pushes it towards covers
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length on middle and leg, flicks it towards short fine leg
length ball on the pads, flicks it towards leg gully
much better line, spinning in from outside off, defended from the back foot
fuller outside off, Ahmadi goes for the reverse sweep but misses. The ball goes between the keeper and leg slip off the pad
length ball around off, goes back and defends as it spin back in
length ball around middle and beating the bat this time, an appeal for lbw but too much doubt there. It hit him high and perhaps was going down as well
fuller around off, lunges forward and blocks
lap sweep this time, plays it from outside off and gets a boundary to fine leg
length ball around off, punches it towards mid-off from the back foot
fuller outside off, looks to thrust his bat at it, the ball hits the inner half and rolls towards short midwicket
length ball outside off, comes forward to defend but gets beaten as the ball turns away
short of length outside off, pushes it towards point from the back foot
fuller outside off, sweeps it in front of square leg
length ball around middle and leg, lets it spin and hit the pads
length ball on middle and leg, padded away once again
fuller around off, flicks it towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball around middle, flicks it towards square leg
length ball around off, defended from the back foot
fuller outside off, brings out the lap shot and gets four to fine leg
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
too full this time, around off, jams his bat at it
fuller around off, lunges forward and blocks
length ball just outside off, turn and bouncethis time for Warrican. Ahmadi goes back before leaving it alone
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
length ball around off and spinning in, Ahmadi fails to connect the sweep and is struck on the arms
length ball around off, pushed towards covers from the back foot
length ball spinning on to the pads, padded away
tossed up outside off and Zadran comes forward and smashes it over extra cover, that's fifty for Afghanistan

a grave misjudgement there from Zadran. A length ball outside off and spinning in. Zadran shouldered arms and let it hit the pad. The impact was just outside off, that but doesn't though as he didn't offer any shot. The finger goes up
fuller outside off, chips it inside out towards the left of extra cover
presses forward to defend
length ball, and he stretches forward to defend
legnth, and he comes forward to drive towards cover
skips down the pitch and flicks this ball against the turn towards deep mid-on
wide of the crease, and he allows it to turn back after pitching around leg and middle, and blocks it

horrendous mix-up! Length ball around off stump and he plays it with a stretch forward towards point. He calls for a single and sets off immediately, and first slip is quick to get across to the wicket. Javed Ahmadi is guilty of ball-watching as he turns Ihsanullah down quite late. He has no chance, as Dowrich whips the bails off
length, and he skips down the wicket to smother the turn and defend towards mid-on
shorter, and he goes back to punch this handsomely. Goes straight towards mid-off
plays a length ball from the crease. Beaten by the over-spin, as it goes on to hit his thigh pad
skips down the wicket, and the length is dragged back a touch. Sharp turn in again, and beats his bat on to pad

Cornwall strikes again! Rahmat Shah, Afghanistan's only Test centurion, looks to stretch forward to meet a length ball around off. This dips on him after drifting a touch away, and then kisses the inside edge of his bat and flies towards forward short-leg, who grabs this perfectly. Sharp catch by Brooks, and another one for Cornwall, who is one away from 10 for the match!
length, around off, and he stretches forward to defend
length, outside off, a bit of turn as it spins past the forward defensive offered by the batsman
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
sharp turn again. This one was bowled slower, and he presses forward to defend. Spins past the outside edge
sweeps from outside off, and does well to keep it low and towards deep backward square leg
length, outside off, and he looks for the lap sweep but misses. Enthusiastic appeal, but then the bowler realises that this has struck Ahmadi well outside off

10 for Cornwall! Asghar Afghan, another senior pro, is done in by bat-pad, as he looks to flick a length ball around middle. Inside edge on to pad, and Brooks takes a simple catch. A little loose from Afghan, as he would have been better advised to offer the full face of the bat this early in his innings. A golden duck for the former captain, and Cornwall looks set to run through Afghanistan yet again!
flicks away a length ball. Nonchalant treatment in a high-pressure situation
length, and he sweeps this away towards deep backward square
length, and he whips it away towards mid-wicket

ooh, almost another one for Cornwall! Loops this up around middle and off, and turns in further. The batsman looks to go down the ground, but realises he isn't to the pitch of it. Scoops it up in the air, and just about clears Roach at mid-off
flighted around off, and he cuts this away towards the vacant deep point area. Will get two for that
presses forward to smother a length ball around off
defends a length ball around off and middle
straighter, and he stretches forward to defend
stretches forward to take a fuller ball before it bounces, from outside off, and gets it away towards fine leg
presses forward to defend a length ball around middle
fuller, and he drives this towards cover
length, around off, and he is beaten outside off as the ball goes on with the arm
length, turn and bounce across him, and he is able to nudge it away towards fine leg. Not far from leg slip!
length, turns in, and he defends from the crease
length, and he flicks this from middle towards deep square leg
length, and he comes forward to defend
a bit shorter in length, and allows him to hang back and flick this with the turn towards deep square leg
presses forward to smother the spin on a length ball around off
length, and he hangs back to defend this back down the pitch
length, and he plays this with the turn across him, with soft hands, towards silly point
presses forward to defend a length ball
a bit shorter, and he goes back and pushes this towards deep mid-wicket
presses forward to defend a length ball around middle
length, cuts back in from outside off, tucking him for room as he looks to defend
pulls out the reverse paddle, and plays it to perfection. Pitched outside off, and importantly was full enough for him to reach out and play it close to the pitch of the ball
length, and he allows the spin to go across him and play it away towards square leg
length, around off, and he presses forward to block this
length, and he goes back to defend
length, defended around off and middle
length, and he presses forward to defend this
meets a length ball under his eyes
sharp turn, away from outside off, and beats the outside edge as Jamal stretches to defend this
presses forward to smother the spin on one pitched around off
shorter, a bit flatter, and he defends from the crease
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
short of a length, and a bit of width, and he cuts this away towards backward point. Played late, and ensured he kept this along the ground. Fine batting!
short again, and he hangs back and cuts this towards point. A bit squarer than the previous shot, but he's showing his range now
length, and he shuffles across to cover the turn and defend
fuller, and he sweeps this flat and hard, towards deep square leg
fuller, and he presses forward to defend this. Off the inner part of the bat, but along the ground towards short leg
presses forward to defend a length ball
length, and he hangs back to defend this after watching it turn from leg to off
good ball! Floats this up around middle, and it turns across the face of his bat as he stretches to defend
length, and he flicks this towards deep square leg. Will pick up two quite comfortably
length, and he goes back to defend
length, slow turn across him. He hangs back and plays this towards point
shorter, and he goes back to cut this past the man at point. Fifty for Ahmadi, and that's also the lead for Afghanistan!
length, and he plays it away towards mid-wicket with the turn
length, and he drives this towards mid-on with the turn
length, and he goes back and plays this with the turn towards leg slip. Keeps it along the ground
fuller, and he presses forward to defend
fired in flatter, and off the inside edge! Jamal wants to play this towards third man, but is decieved by the speed in it. Off the inner edge and along the ground towards leg slip
presses forward to defend a length ball around off stump
sharp turn across from off to beyond leg, as this pitches short of a length. The batsman watches it through
presses forward to defend a length ball
reverse sweep offered to a length ball around off stump. There's protection in the deep in the point region, now

gone through him! This hasn't turned as much as Jamal expects, as he stretches forward to defend. Pitches outside off and just a hint of turn inwards, and goes on to clip the top of off. Bonus wicket for West Indies in many ways, and this now exposes Afsar Zazai and the rest of the bowlers
tossed up around off, and he stretches forward to defend
length, and he goes back to defend this towards point
length, and he plays it towards fine leg
flatter ball, just around off stump, and he goes back to defend this towards fine leg

length, outside off, edged away, and dropped by Shai Hope at first slip! Hamza was playing for turn, but this went on straight, and flew low to the right of Hope, who dived away to his right but couldn't grab this at the first go
length, presses forward to defend
defends with a stretch forward
presses forward to meet a length ball around off under his eyes
length, and he defends on the on side
drives a length ball towards cover
length, and he covers the line to defend
tosses this up around off, and he presses forward to defend

the change of angle works! Tosses this up, and invites the drive from Hamza. The ball doesn't turn as much as Hamza hopes, and flies low to the left of Cornwall at first slip. He gets his big hands across to this and holds on
length, turns back in from the angle around the wicket, and Zazai plays back to this
length ball, starts from around leg, and he looks to avoid this. Goes off the thigh pad and runs away towards fine leg
pitches around off, and he sweeps this towards long leg
tossed up, and he drives this towards long-on
length, and he goes back to defend
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
some turn on offer, from off to leg, and he defends this from the crease
skips down the wicket and takes a length ball on the half-volley, flicking it towards deep mid-wicket
length, and he drives this back towards the bowler
sharp turn back in from outside off, and he goes back to defend
floated around off, and he pulls out the reverse paddle again. Good shot, as he controls this well, and keeps it along the ground to the third man boundary
length, and he goes straight down the ground with this. One-bounce and through the long-off boundary for four

Chase has another! Goes on with the angle across the batsman, who stretches forward to meet this. Off the edge, and runs low through to Cornwall, who keeps himself low and collects this. Chase goes off on a celebratory run
fuller around middle, drives it towards mid-on
length ball on middle and leg, looks for the flick but misses
length ball around off and middle, defended
goes for the slog sleep, gets a top edge but it bounces well short of deep square leg
skips down but Cornwall shortens his length, defended awkwardly in the end
use of feet once again, flicks it towards short midwicket

and he strikes first ball. Short of length around off stump, Rashid is almost squared up as he looks to defend. A healthy edge towards the right of Dowrich who puts in the dive and grabs it with his fingertips. The ball wobbles but he clings to his chest to hold on to it
short of length at the batsman, dabs it towards short leg region
short of length around off, gets the batsman hopping in the crease. Defended towards cover-point
length ball outside off, defends away from the body. A thick outside edge towards gully
short of length around off, hops back and defends
fuller outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
length ball around off and spinning in, flicks it towards deep-backward square leg, denies the single
length ball around off, goes back and defends
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg. Takes the single this time
kicks off from a length around off but Ahmadzai does well to get the bottom hand off and dab it down towards short leg
length ball around off and middle, turn once again, defended from the crease
length ball around middle and spinning down, turns it on the leg side
short of length outside off, around fifth stump, Zazai pushes at it and gets beaten
beats the outside edge once more. A touch fuller and closer to the batsman, Zazai was looking to defend and misses again
